price: 8. Xus Magaca (Alle) Rabbigaa, oo u ahow daacad si dhan (Isagoo Keliyana isku hallee oo tala saaro).
arabic: وَٱذۡكُرِ ٱسۡمَ رَبِّكَ وَتَبَتَّلۡ إِلَيۡهِ تَبۡتِيلٗا

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wa-udh'kuri is'ma rabbika watabattal ilayhi tabtīlan
